text: How do I restrict foreign keys choices to related objects only in django
I have a two way foreign relation similar to the following

code:
class Parent(models.Model):
  name = models.CharField(max_length=255)
  favoritechild = models.ForeignKey("Child", blank=True, null=True)

class Child(models.Model):
  name = models.CharField(max_length=255)
  myparent = models.ForeignKey(Parent)

text: How do I restrict the choices for Parent.favoritechild to only children whose parent is itself?

code:
class Parent(models.Model):
  name = models.CharField(max_length=255)
  favoritechild = models.ForeignKey("Child", blank=True, null=True, limit_choices_to = {"myparent": "self"})

text: but that causes the admin interface to not list any children.
